abstract: Mark Sanford may not be able to run for president, but he will comment on the campaign as a commentator for Fox News.
snippet: Mark Sanford may not be able to run for president, but he will comment on the campaign as a commentator for Fox News.
lead_paragraph: Former Gov. Mark Sanford of South Carolina may have not have been able to run for the 2012 Republican presidential nomination after his 2009 cheating scandal, but he will at least get to talk about the campaign on national television - as a paid contributor on Fox News, the Caucus has learned.

headline.main: Ex-Governor of South Carolina Joins Fox News
